text: The 2006 season of Highschool Football League began on February 16, 2006 and ended on May 25, 2006. National Pei Men Senior High School football team of Tainan County became the first champion of the league. == League table == == Qualification == The top 4 teams of Chinese Taipei National Youth Cup 2005 season (Yilan, Pei Men, San Chung, and Hualien) were automatically granted to become the league members. The remaining 4 places were contested by Ching Shui, Chung Cheng, Chung Shan, Hsin Feng, Hualien Agriculture, Pingtung, and Taipei though a qualification competition held on December 19 and 20, 2005. In the qualification competition, the teams are placed in either group A or group B and play every team in their group once. The winner of each group qualifies for the 2006 season of the Highschool Football League while the second-placed team in each group plays the third-placed team in the other group in a playoff to determine the final two teams that qualify for the league. === Group A === \---- \---- Hsin Feng qualifies for the 2006 season of the Highschool Football League as the winner of group A. === Group B === \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- Taipei qualifies for the 2006 season of the Highschool Football League as the winner of group B. ===Playoffs=== \---- Chung Shan and Chung Cheng qualify for the 2006 season of the Highschool Football League as playoff winners. == Results == === Round 1 === \---- \---- \---- === Round 2 === \---- \---- \---- ===Round 3=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 4=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 5=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 6=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 7=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 8=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 9=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 10=== \---- \---- \---- == Top goalscorers == {| class="wikitable" |- !Player !Goals !Team |- |- |Chen Po-liang |style="text-align:center;"|11 |Chung Cheng |- |Wu Pai-ho |style="text-align:center;"|10 |Pei Men |- |Lo Chih-an |style="text-align:center;"|9 |Ilan |- |Lin Ching-tsan |style="text- align:center;"|8 |Hualien |- |Tai Hung-hsu |style="text-align:center;"|6 |San Chung |- |Huang Wei |style="text-align:center;"|5 |San Chung |- |Huang Kun- huang |style="text-align:center;"|5 |Taipei |- |Lin Chia-ming |style="text- align:center;"|5 |Chung Cheng |- |Chan Che-yuan |style="text-align:center;"|5 |Chung Cheng |- |Chen Meng-tsung |style="text-align:center;"|5 |Hsin Feng |- |} == Awards == * Best coach: Chen Jiunn-ming (Pei Men) * Best player: Yang Chao-hsun (Pei Men) * Golden shoe: Wu Pai-ho (Pei Men) According to league regulation, the Golden Shoe candidate should come from teams of top four places. As a result, though Chung Cheng striker Chen Po-liang scored the most goals in the league season, the Golden Shoe award was given to Wu Pai-ho of National Pei Men Senior High School. == Footnotes == == External links == * Highschool Football League 2006 Category:Highschool Football League seasons 2 Taiwan Taiwan
title: 2006 Highschool Football League
